sermons.title: Essential Remembering
sermons.description: What a wonderful mind God has given us! We have the ability to recall things, but things also tend to drain out of our mind. The question is, "What is essential to remember?" It is very important to God that we give diligence to remember some things, especially God Himself. A list of practical ways to do this is given.
